AEON Credit Service Personal Loans Details
“AEON Mobile App” Personal Loan
Complete the entire loan application process via the mobile app 4.49%
AEON Flexi Personal Loan Scheme
Flexible repayment period with no handling fee 4.49%
Why AEON Personal Loans?
AEON personal loan is characterized by as low as 0.2% monthly flat rate. The lowest annualized percentage rate (“APR”) is 4.49%. The maximum loan amount is HK$800,000 or 8X monthly salary (whichever is lower). Also, enjoy flexible repayment period from 6 to 48 months with no handling fee.
AEON Personal Loan Application Methods
Method #1
Apply Online
One of the easiest way to apply for AEON personal loan is to apply on AEON website at the comfort of your home anytime. You can upload the required documents online.
Method #2
Call Application Hotline
Customers can call AEON Personal Loan hotline at +852 2895-6262 during office hours to apply for a personal loan .
Method #3
Visit AEON Branch
Visit a nearby AEON Brach in Hong Kong/ Kowloon/ New Territories in person during office hours to apply for loans.
Method #4
AEON Mobile App
Download and logon "AEON HK" Mobile APP to apply for the personal loan. The entire process can be done via the mobile app without the need to show up at all.
What documents do I need to apply for an AEON loan?
To apply for AEON personal loan, applicants are required to submit your Hong Kong identity card, proof of residence and proof of income. It is worth noting that loan amount over HK$50,000 must be credited to the designated bank account. Therefore, applicants are also required to provide valid local personal bank account details for fund transfer and monthly repayment purposes.
FAQ
Am I qualified for AEON personal loans?
To be eligible for AEON personal loan, applicants must be a Hong Kong resident who is at least 18 years old.
Can I check the status of AEON loan applications online?
Yes. Applicants can check the status of their loan applications online or via the “AEON Mobile App”.
How can I pay back AEON loan?
Repayment can be made via PPS, autopay, JET payment and internet banking from numerous major banks such as BOC, BEA, HSBC, Citibank, Hang Seng Bank etc.
